dct_description_sm: Geological Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences. Geological Survey of Israel. Companion text: Tectonics / Vladimir G. Kazmin. Geological framework of the Levant. Volume I: Cyprus and Syria / Valerie A. Krqasheninnikov; John K. Hall; Francis Hirsch; Chaim Benjamini. Jerusalem: Historical Productions-Hall. 2005. 463-498 p. Article is chapter 8. North Decimal Degree 37.3333. South Decimal Degree 32.300. East Decimal Degree 42.4167. West Decimal Degree 35.700. Map is plate IIb. Mercator projection, Pulkovo 1942 datum. "This map is based on the "Depth scheme map of Crystalline basement at scale 1:500,000, compiled in 1986 by T. Sawaf, Syrian Petroleum Company. Small changes added by V. Kazmin, and coloring by J. K Hall, who noted some slight topological difficulties.".
